栿字的基本解释

栿
fú
房梁：“二门衡栿之上皆刻云龙风虎之状。”

栿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》房六切，入屋，奉。］
(1)房梁。
(2)即榨。挤压出物体汁液的器具。

栿字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页524第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?房六切，音伏。梁栿也。【正字通】以小木附大木上爲栿。

栿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栿字的起名意思

房梁。

Basic explanation of words
Yi
fú
Room beam: "Ermen Hengyi is carved with clouds, dragons, wind and tigers."
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" room six cuts, enter the room, bong. ]
(1) Room beams.
(2) Instant squeezing. An appliance for squeezing out the juice of an object.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栿; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 524 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] The room has six cuts, and the sound is flat. Liang Yi also. 【Zhengzitong】The small wood attached to the big wood is the 栿.
